episodes.name: Ongoing sanctification or perpetual sin?
episodes.description: Today we will look at a question that we received from a listener regarding continuous sin in the life of a Christian. We will look at how to differentiate between ongoing sanctification versus falling into perpetual sin and what we should do when faced with questions about the authenticity of our salvation.

episodes.name: How do you approach someone about Christ?
episodes.description: Today Pastor Matt will answer a common question Christians ourselves face often and unpack the actions to take.

episodes.name: Interviewing the Host
episodes.description: In this episode, Noah Greer, the podcast host, will be interviewed and give his testimony.

episodes.name: When is not telling the whole truth a lie?
episodes.description: In this episode, we will draw connections in God's Word to answer a commonly faced question that can weigh on the mind of the Christian and affect our reactions.

episodes.name: What is predestination? - Part 3
episodes.description: In today's episode, we will wrap up our excerpt on predestination by looking into some of the objections regarding its doctrine and the resolution found in scripture.

episodes.name: What is predestination? - Part 2
episodes.description: Today we will continue to discuss last week's topic and go deeper into the biblical references and passages regarding predestination, foreknowledge, and election.

episodes.name: What is predestination? - Part 1
episodes.description: In the upcoming episodes, we will look into what predestination is, what the Bible says regarding it, and why it's so controversial. In today's episode, we will start by laying that foundation.

episodes.name: Why is Rahab the harlot considered an example of faith?
episodes.description: While a listener was reading through Hebrews 11, he encountered a verse that stated that Rahab, a harlot and a liar, was an example of acting by faith. We will turn to God's Word and answer this question in this episode.

episodes.name: Can a Christian who committed suicide still go to heaven?
episodes.description: Today Pastor Matt will again look to God's Word and dissect the deep and heavy topic of suicide and how it affects a Christian's faith and salvation.

episodes.name: Should a Christian be afraid of death?
episodes.description: In this episode, Pastor Matt will look to scripture and dissect why we shouldn't fear death and what we should do in preparation.

episodes.name: How can I deny myself, and carry my cross?
episodes.description: This week, Pastor Matt will go in depth about how we should live in response to Jesus's words in Matthew 16:24.

episodes.name: How should we pray?
episodes.description: In response to last week's episode, today we will again turn to scripture to unpack how we should pray from Jesus's teachings. We will go in-depth on what the Lord's Prayer means in Matthew 6 and how it can be applied in our prayer life.

episodes.name: Why don't my prayers get answered?
episodes.description: Throughout life, especially in difficult times, it can feel like our prayers aren't answered, or God isn't listening. Today, with Pastor Matt's help, we will turn to God's Word and extract the details of how God hears our prayers.

episodes.name: How should a Christian approach an unequally yoked wedding?
episodes.description: What is our obligation as believers in response to unequally yoked weddings? Should we decline attendance altogether? To answer these questions, Pastor Matt will turn to God's Word and unveil what God has shown us.

episodes.name: Should a Christian celebrate Christmas?
episodes.description: In today's episode, we will look back on history to discover the origins of the Christmas celebration and turn to God's Word to conclude whether or not a Christian should participate in the Christmas of today's world.

episodes.name: How do you prove that the Bible is true?
episodes.description: Today we will work through how we can prove the truth of the gospel to an agnostic unbeliever, and tackle the real heart of the problem.

episodes.name: If God is real, why won't He reveal Himself?
episodes.description: A common question asked by both believers and non-believers alike. Today we will turn to scripture and bring a conclusion to this question.

episodes.name: What is the meaning of life?
episodes.description: The meaning of life is a question that most people ponder about often. God's Word gives us a clear and concise answer.

episodes.name: How can a Christian overcome addiction?
episodes.description: In this episode, Pastor Matt will work through the truth about addiction and how we can escape it by depending on Christ.

episodes.name: If God is Good, then why do people go to Hell?
episodes.description: Today Pastor Matt will explain the position of our souls relative to God's perfection, and what that means for us.

episodes.name: What is the Gospel and Salvation?
episodes.description: The fundamentals of the Christian faith are found in the gospel. Today we will answer and cover the most important question about what the gospel and salvation mean.

episodes.name: What does it mean to follow Christ?
episodes.description: Today we will tackle what it means to die to ourselves, pick up our cross, seek after Christ, and the reward that comes from doing so.

episodes.name: How do I know if I'm saved?
episodes.description: This question has worried every Christian at least once in their lives. We will turn to God's Word and see what He reveals to us about our faith and what He has done on the cross.

episodes.name: Are all sins equal?
episodes.description: In this episode we turn to God's Word and see what He says about the weight of sin, it's consequences, and it's impact on a Christian life. We also discuss the only source of salvation and freedom from sin, Jesus Christ.

episodes.name: Is it sinful to wake up and start the day without spending time in prayer and in God's Word?
episodes.description: The answer to a simple question can affect how we live our lives. Today we find out if a Christian is commanded to spend time with God each morning.

episodes.name: If jealousy is a sin, how can God be a jealous God?
episodes.description: In this episode, we will tackle a question that arose from a reader as they were reading Exodus 20:5.

episodes.name: Introduction - Part 2
episodes.description: Today we continue the interview with Pastor Matt Round that we started last episode.

episodes.name: Introduction - Part 1
episodes.description: Welcome to the Grounded Podcast. Today we meet Pastor Matt Round for the first time.
